Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits publishers from limiting the number of copies of e-books available at public libraries
Summary: Prohibits publishers from limiting the number of copies of e-books available at public libraries in New York.
LawCode: Add ยง338, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting publishers from limiting the number of copies of e-books available at public libraries
